website_summaries.verdict: A stunning dark oak finish on this retro-styled TV stand featuring sturdy construction and a functional utility drawer.
pros: Easily fits a flat screen TV up to 47-inches
Engineered wood core with ash veneer and oak finish
Large drawer for storage and a feature shelf for audio and video components
Back is open for easy cable management

customer_reviews.title: fortunately there are also screws that go there so I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something simple, and this looks just as is pictured. I did buy wood glue to put in where you put the little dollroads--no glue was included. Have to say when putting it together, there were two holes that were off on the track part where the drawer fits--two holes for the little dollrods that you glue in. But, fortunately there are also screws that go there so I'm sure it'll be just fine. But, the holes pre-drilled just didn't line up with each other. Otherwise, very happy with how it turned out.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Very nice corner TV stand - GREAT PRICE - FIVE STARS *****
customer_reviews.text: TV stand looks great and has a solid built. We have moved it from the corner to the middle of the room and actually settled with the middle location. It does not have a back cover and we actually like that. If you want you can install them yourself simply by buying the material as mentioned by a couple reviews. Some reviewers complain that it may be from China and have problems with that. The reality is that a lot of the stuff we buy is made in China. The vendor is extremely accessible and is willing and wants to HELP. Buy this nice TV stand, place it wherever you want, and enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: GREAT customer service, looks great in my living room
customer_reviews.text: I'll admit, there were some issues with some of the parts being incorrectly drilled, but I spoke with customer service and the technical department and they quickly sent replacement parts that were correct. Once I had these parts, everything went together well and I have a TV stand that looks great with my coffee table & side tables! SO happy with my purchase and the responsiveness of the company!
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: damaged in mailing.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice space saver. Would give a much higher review but product came damaged with chips and scratches. Outside pkg. Damaged. Tired of returning amazon goods.too many products not right so just kept it. Would recommend if not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Mary's Fire

customer_reviews.title: Not bad from an assembly standpoint
customer_reviews.text: Not bad from an assembly standpoint. Takes a little time but relatively easy to do. A nice looking stand that fits in corners or along a wall (we've moved it twice already... women's prerogative). Sturdy. Reasonably priced and shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: BigO

customer_reviews.title: Trust the reviews
customer_reviews.text: Everything everyone else already said about this stand is true. It is a great piece for the price. Sturdy and good-looking. Nothing fancy, but very serviceable for its purpose and subdued enough that it doesn't really stand out in any way, which is fine. I really like the drawer for stocking remotes, video games, and controllers out of view. The design fills a corner nicely while not jutting out too far into the room. So glad I found this! Just what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: DandyLion

customer_reviews.title: Very nice TV stand
customer_reviews.text: Vey nice stand. But because it is made of particle board and not properly packaged for shipping; it arrived damaged at the tips on the top section of my stand. Also; when UPS dropped the package off at my front door they literally “dropped” it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great corner stand
customer_reviews.text: Arrived 2 days after ordering. It is a little darker wood than in the picture. For the price you can't go wrong. Took about 2 hours for me to set up, It would have been quicker and easier with 2 people some of the pieces are odd shaped and hard to hold with one hand. I took my time and read all instructions and laid out all the pieces. Everything is labeled even the the packages of screws and parts etc. I would def recommend.
customer_reviews.author: pjl

customer_reviews.title: perfect corner piece for the TV
customer_reviews.text: We needed something to hold our 55in TV in a small space, this was perfect and the price was right. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A very nice looking cabinet for the price
customer_reviews.text: A very nice looking cabinet for the price, especially if you don't have a lot of room. Easy to put together (I'm 59 & was able to do it myself), took about an hour. I bought this for a relative and she's had lots of compliments on it, especially when they learn the price.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Arrived defective
customer_reviews.text: I put this entire thing together for my mom whose a widow on limited income and found a chip right on the front! No way to call amazon due to covid so I guess we are stuck with a defective product. I’m certainly not going to attempt to take this apart and send it back. Would like for amazon to make this right and discount the product.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Owen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Shipping as fast. Quality is high. Assembly was easy. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: my husband put this together and it was easy. The piece looks expensive and fits nicely in ...
customer_reviews.text: my husband put this together and it was easy. The piece looks expensive and fits nicely in our den. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Took a bit longer to assemble than I expected, and at a couple of steps, required two people to assemble, but overall, this unit is perfect for the corner of our cabin. As others have suggested, using some kind of glue (I used wood glue) on the dowels will help in providing solid assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Feuerer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking. Fits the bill.
customer_reviews.text: fits nicely in corner and is nice looking piece of furniture. Doesn't look like put together stuff. Have TV mounted on wall over this. Fits all the other stuff, DVD, cable box, home theatre box in the shelf as well as a router.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon K. Hari

customer_reviews.title: 3 and 1/2 hours to assemble
customer_reviews.text: For almost $200, this was a nightmare to assemble. Instructions were terrible. I broke one piece and of course there were no extras. For something this expensive, the material is cheap, particle board. Spend the money and buy something nicer!
customer_reviews.author: Badger1

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of junk. None of the predrilled holes lined up. Absolute waste of 6 hours trying to put it together. Save your money and avoid this trash.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Recktenwald

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, but needs a back plate
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the stand is very good, and certainly worth what we paid for it, but it's lacking a back plate. We use it as a media stand, to hold a DVR and a couple other such items, that is. As expected, those items have wires, and unfortunately this media stand lets it all hang out. Not pretty.Just need to rig something up, maybe find a piece of wood we can stain to match, or a piece of black cloth. Something to hide the ugly wires that are seen hanging down in the back.
customer_reviews.author: It's M!

customer_reviews.title: but the customer service shipped the parts pretty quickly. If you like wood instead of black ...
customer_reviews.text: It came missing some hardware for the drawer, but the customer service shipped the parts pretty quickly. If you like wood instead of black glass, you will love this stand.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Ice

customer_reviews.title: Tv stand
customer_reviews.text: Great stand. The directions were a little hard to follow. Need better pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Cronk

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT FOR THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: We bought this based on it's looks and price. It went together pretty quickly and is perfect for the area we needed to hold the TV. It has a nice shaker style look to it and is not as flimsy as others have indicated. Friends of ours commented on how good looking the unit is - we are happy campers! A good value, quick shipping, attractive piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Bobswife

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mother for Christmas. She is very pleased and I am also. Arrived very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: " Scrathes easily is an understatement!"
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to put together. Screws strip easily when trying to tighten. Had to send for a new piece, which they sent.
customer_reviews.author: linda beckner

customer_reviews.title: About what you expect!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Inexpensive, easy to assemble, functional Cons: Thin wood, Made in China I found the stand easy to assemble and it's functional for my use. I think it looks better from a distance (or online) than in person. It has a decent finish, but the wood is thin. I'm not sure that the stand would survive more than a couple of moves.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: Had some rough edges, splinters on the underside of ...
customer_reviews.text: Had some rough edges, splinters on the underside of the top edge. But it did go together well and it is just what I needed. Quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: June Lee

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece of furniture. Very sturdy. Easy to assemble. Looks great in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: T. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This assembles easily and arrived with all the parts in the box and undamaged. It looks fine, not particularly cheap, and is sturdy enough to hold our 46" flat screen TV. Very pleased with it. We have now had this for two years, and it still looks fine. It does, however, have a sligh bow in the top panel from holding the heavy (expensive) 46" Samsung tv for the last two years. Not a problem yet - and may never be. If it is, I still think for the money this is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: susan6005

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my family room.
customer_reviews.text: A great addition to my family room. Fits great in the corner the right size for my 40 inch flat screen and just the right height.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Kanik

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: The item was of great quality, easy instructions and is everything I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece for a put together piece of furniture. perfect for what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: David Glass

customer_reviews.title: Great stand for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The media stand is not a bad buy. Fairly sturdy but the packaging was not the best. There was a little damage to the back corner but not bad enough to warrant a return. Overall pleased with this stand and would recommend it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: * Rocky Top Boys *

customer_reviews.title: nice tv stand
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered very quickly! It makes a nice corner piece and blends in nicely with our oak furniture.
customer_reviews.author: J. Meltzer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I rarely give 5 stars. This looks very nice and fit my needs. Packed well and easy to assemble.good color match on all parts Mark
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a nice piece of furniture when its put together
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a nice piece of furniture when its put together. Not to hard to put together , just tighten the screws to snug or you will have trouble. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: young old guy

customer_reviews.title: Mission Accomplished
customer_reviews.text: It came quickly and was very well packaged. No damages . The directions were a tad bit confusing but after a few minutes I had it together and was watching TV. Nice color and design. Not a lot of room for components or DVDs but the overall quality is A+.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not super fancy but solidly designed and a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Two person set up needed. Very sturdy. I was expecting the color to be lighter, but that may be my computer color settings. Extremely fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Deitre

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and sturdy - perfect in our living room and a great value too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice TV Stand, easy to assemble. Fast shipping. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material, ridiculous construction The first step of assembly ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap material , ridiculous construction The first step of assembly is poised at an impossible angle. Had to call and ask for additional plastic plugs that split the minute you tried to screw them into the crummy fiberboard. A nightmare that we had to reinforce with our own screws and ingenuity. Yuk !
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Morel

customer_reviews.title: Poor oak material, if it is even that. I don't think it is.
customer_reviews.text: Oak color was to dark. Looks almost like cherry. Not even close match to my oak furniture. You need a big corner to fit it in. I put it against a flat wall instead. Some of the finish was done poorly. Came from China, my mistake. To late to return it because it has been assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Jahaske

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Cheap material, not worth full price paid. That's what we get now for oversea products. Buy American or accept inferior products
customer_reviews.author: Bob Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Questionable quality
customer_reviews.text: Stand turned out to be darker color than image shown. Cam bolts are made from a soft alloy and do not fit/tighten properly.
customer_reviews.author: hall63

customer_reviews.title: Really like the wood grain and the stand fit perfectly in ...
customer_reviews.text: Really like the wood grain and the stand fit perfectly in the corner. Did need to have a man put it together for me. Way too many parts for me to do.
customer_reviews.author: Kempy

product_meta.title: Corner Media Stand - Dark Oak Wood Finish - 46" Television Console
product_meta.description: Put those corners to work! This mission inspired corner media stand is finished in dark oak and provides the perfect complement to your home entertainment system. Display your flat screen TV and media players or receivers, and store movies, games, and accessories. Convenient corner design is perfect for maximizing the use of your room. this item features a broad top, 1 open shelf, and 1 spacious drawer, an open back for cord management and can accommodate a flat panel TV up to 46" W overall. Dimensions include: Overall: 48" W x 16" D x 24.5" H; Tabletop: 33.75" W x 15.75"; Shelf: 28" W x 15" D x 9" H; Drawer: 23.25" W x 11" D x 3.25" H. This one-of-a-kind item approximately weighs 49 pounds and can support up to 175 pounds. Only quality materials and manufacturing will do. Product materials include: Ash veneer and MDF construction. Assembly required. Made in China.
feature_bullets: Small space friendly corner profile; Accommodates a flat panel TV up to 46" W overall
Mission inspired craftsman style; Dark oak finish
Overall: 48" W x 16" D x 24.5" H; Tabletop: 33.75" W x 15.75"; Shelf: 28" W x 15" D x 9" H; Drawer: 23.25" W x 11" D x 3.25" H
Materials: Ash veneer and MDF construction; Supports up to: 175 lb.; Approx. weight: 49 lb.
Broad top, 1 open shelf, and 1 spacious drawer; Open back for cord management
Accommodates up to a 47-inch flat panel TV

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars96 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
